original_text: Jacob then put out his right hand. But he put it on Ephraim's head, even though Ephraim was the younger son. Jacob crossed his arms so that he put his left hand on Manasseh's head. Manasseh was Joseph's firstborn son.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 오른손을 펴서 차남 에브라임의 머리에 얹고 왼손을 펴서 므낫세의 머리에 얹으니 므낫세는 장자라도 팔을 엇바꾸어 얹었더라

sentences.original_text: Jacob then put out his right hand.
But he put it on Ephraim's head,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그것을 에브라임의 머리에 두었습니다,

sentences.original_text: even though Ephraim was the younger son.
so that he put his left hand on Manasseh's head.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그의 왼손을 므낫세의 머리에 두었습니다.
